verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H1121"\w* end, \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* changed, \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Core, \w for|strong="H1121"\w* understanding. \w A|strong="H1121"\w* canticle \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Beloved.

\w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* hath uttered \w a|strong="H8085"\w* good word \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w speak|strong="H5608"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w works|strong="H6466"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* king; \w My|strong="H8085"\w* tongue \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* pen \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* scrivener \w that|strong="H3117"\w* writeth swiftly.

Thou art beautiful above \w the|strong="H7971"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w men|strong="H3423"\w*: grace \w is|strong="H3027"\w* poured abroad \w in|strong="H3027"\w* thy lips; \w therefore|strong="H0859"\w* hath \w God|strong="H3027"\w* blessed thee \w for|strong="H3027"\w* ever.
Gird thy \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* upon thy thigh, O thou most \w mighty|strong="H2220"\w*.

\w With|strong="H0430"\w* thy comeliness \w and|strong="H0430"\w* thy beauty \w set|strong="H6680"\w* out, proceed prosperously, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* reign. Because \w of|strong="H4428"\w* truth \w and|strong="H0430"\w* meekness \w and|strong="H0430"\w* justice: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* thy right hand \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* conduct thee wonderfully.

Thy arrows \w are|strong="H8034"\w* sharp: under thee \w shall|strong="H8034"\w* \w people|strong="H6862"\w* fall, into \w the|strong="H6965"\w* hearts \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* king’s \w enemies|strong="H6965"\w*.

Thy throne, O \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w is|strong="H2719"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever \w and|strong="H2719"\w* ever: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sceptre \w of|strong="H2719"\w* thy kingdom \w is|strong="H2719"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* sceptre \w of|strong="H2719"\w* uprightness.

Thou hast loved justice, \w and|strong="H0954"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* iniquity: \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* God, thy God, hath anointed thee \w with|strong="H0954"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* oil \w of|strong="H0954"\w* gladness above thy fellows.

Myrrh \w and|strong="H0430"\w* stacte \w and|strong="H0430"\w* cassia perfume thy garments, \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ivory houses: \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* which

\w The|strong="H3318"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H6635"\w* kings \w have|strong="H3808"\w* delighted thee \w in|strong="H6635"\w* thy glory. \w The|strong="H3318"\w* queen stood \w on|strong="H3318"\w* thy right hand, \w in|strong="H6635"\w* gilded clothing; surrounded \w with|strong="H3318"\w* variety.

Hearken, O daughter, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* see, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* incline thy ear: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* forget thy \w people|strong="H6862"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* thy father’s house.

\w And|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* king \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* greatly desire thy beauty; \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3978"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Lord thy \w God|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w they|strong="H1471"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* adore.

\w And|strong="H1952"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H3808"\w* Tyre with gifts, yea, all \w the|strong="H3808"\w* rich \w among|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* entreat thy countenance.
\w All|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* glory \w of|strong="H2781"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* king’s daughter is within \w in|strong="H7760"\w* golden borders,

Clothed round about \w with|strong="H7218"\w* varieties. After \w her|strong="H7760"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* virgins \w be|strong="H1471"\w* \w brought|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* king: \w her|strong="H7760"\w* neighbours \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w be|strong="H1471"\w* \w brought|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H1471"\w* thee.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* brought \w with|strong="H3117"\w* gladness \w and|strong="H3117"\w* rejoicing: \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* brought \w into|strong="H1322"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* temple \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* king.

Instead \w of|strong="H6963"\w* thy fathers, sons \w are|strong="H6440"\w* born \w to|strong="H6440"\w* thee: thou shalt make \w them|strong="H6440"\w* princes \w over|strong="H6440"\w* all \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* remember thy \w name|strong="H8266"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* generations. Therefore \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* praise thee \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w ever|strong="H7911"\w*; yea, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w ever|strong="H7911"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w ever|strong="H7911"\w*.
